pages.text: Quite frankly, I change or add rules so often and it has come to my attention that I'm increasingly lazy, so I will no longer be updating this section and will now refer players reading this directly to our Discord where we DO keep the rules updated, of course.$(br2)$(l:https://ptb.discord.com/channels/783169828931239937/1041571486856654858)Please click here to be taken to our server rules.$()
$(italic)This means everything under the ''Rules'' category in this tome is irrelevant, so ONLY follow the rules listed on the Discord.
